room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by iPanic Escape Room in Lakeland
review: I have done all 4 rooms. They are all so much fun and the staff is always amazing!! David is the bomb 💣💣

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by iPanic Escape Room in Lakeland
review: My boyfriend and I decided to try a 20 minute room tonight and loved every second of it! We chose the spy challenge & it was a blast. David (I hope that’s right!) at the front desk was a delight and made the experience even better than we expected. We will definitely be back with our friends for a 60 minute room soon!!

room_title: Escape room "Secret Agent" by iPanic Escape Room in Lakeland
review: Went with my friend, we did one of the 20 minute rooms (Secret Agent). It was super fun! The guy working at the desk (wish we got his name!!) was SUPER helpful and made it a fun experience. His energy was great! We can’t wait to go back and try another room 😁
